The Subtle Art Of Cold Emailing
item.description: What is cold- emailing? Is there a dream company/dream role you want to work for? Do you want a reply from your favorite celebrity? Do you want to get mentored by your idol? Cold-emailing can do it for you! You never know, when a simple tweet or an email or a message can lead to your first big hit! Put your creative hat on and get the desired results! There are numerous examples of people getting hired from a LinkedIn post or an email, becoming a social media celebrity overnight and more.
